hero.title: I'm HÃ©velin, a Front-end Web Developer
hero.text: Currently, I'm focused on expanding  my knowledge through courses and bootcamps online, while I work on personal projects involving front-end and back-end. In these projects, I put into practice skills like server creation, API consumption, website structure and styling, in addition to versioning with Git.

items.name: AMOR & PATAS
items.description: AMOR & PATAS was developed as a management system for an animal shelter, it allows the registration of species, breeds, sizes, and animals, as well as shelter staff, with registrations done only by an administrator. The public application includes the following pages: home, list of animals available for adoption, an introduction to the shelter staff and a contact page to send messages/questions to the shelter managers.
